location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to George Brown, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Bombay Government of a report received by the Resident from Captain Matson, Commander of the Moholar, that his ship was pursued by pirates while en route to Bushire from Bombay. It is noted that this matches accounts of Johassene [Qāsimī] boat movements received from the southern ports.
